name: BarginToWin
description:
BarginToWin is trade bargain simulation game that you buy cheap and sell for profit!

What's special?
You only need "Mouse and numbers key to play!
You will bargain with AI to buy goods CHEAPER
And
You can SELL for PROFIT or STORE for collection!

Finally
Achieve 100% collection percentage!

UPGRADES

  • RANK UPGRADE that will give you advantage while bargain
  • LIST UPGRADE that will give you more options to choose item
  • DAITS UPGRADE which is an APP that can buy goods more expensive for the collection
  • Android Jail Break (IN DEVELOPMENT)
  • Space Coin (IN DEVELOPMENT)
  • And more in the future!
